Locations.name: Lobby
Locations.description: The lobby is a dust room empty of furnishings. Small scuffs cover the floor. A well-used room in an old building. Poorly cared for.

Locations.name: Main Hall
Locations.description: The Main Hall was once a grand space. Rugs and tapestries now covered in dust and mold. The air is still. You can almost hear the sounds of merriment that once echoed here.
